title: I need help with this
body:
Now i have 108rp on my account and i need 16rp so i can get a key fragment. Can i get 16rp from riot games so i don't have to purchase more rp? 
Thanks.

replies.body: Draw something league related and I am sure a Rioter will care about it.

> [{quoted}](name=Her Protection,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KZU5hyBE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-14T13:02:23.487+0000)
>
> Draw something league related and I am sure a Rioter will care about it.

Like softcore poppy hentai
